00012 void OrientationAndHeading::init(){
00013   timer = 0;
00014   for (int i = 0; i < 3 ; i++){
00015     sens_value[i] = 0;// {0,0,0,0,0,0};  // array of sensor data
00016     sens_offset[i] = 0;// {0,0,0,0,0,0}; // array of offset values for sensors
00017     gyro4x[i] = 0;// {0,0,0};  // array of Gyro amplifed (4x) values - relative data 
00018     accel[i] = 0;// {0,0,0};  // array of accelerometer data - relative data 
00019     gyro4xIntegrated[i] = 0;//{0,0,0};
00020   }
00021   for (int i = 3; i < 6; i++){
00022     sens_value[i] = 0;// {0,0,0,0,0,0};  // array of sensor data
00023     sens_offset[i] = 0;// {0,0,0,0,0,0}; // array of offset values for sensors
00024   }
00025   getOffset();  
00026 }
00027 
00028 void OrientationAndHeading::getOffset(){
00029 
00030   for (int a=0; a<offsetXValues; a++)      // acquire data a lot of times in order to produce 
00031   {                             // good offset value - "warm-up" ADC
00032     readADC(); //read ADC sensor values
00033     //   Serial.print("."); //print dot to show that Arduino is doing something
00034     //in this case acquiring data from 6 DOF Razor board
00035   }                                                     
00036 
00037   for (int c=0; c<6; c++)
00038   {
00039     sens_offset[c] = sens_value[c];       // store offset values in offset array
00040   } 
00041   sens_offset[3] = sens_offset[3] + 101; //adding 101 (raw value of 1g) to z accelerometer
00042   //depending on your wanted axes orientation this
00043   //can be eitehr + 101 or - 101  
00044 }
00045 void OrientationAndHeading::readADC(){
00046   for (int i=0; i<6; i++)  sens_value[i] = analogRead(i);// ((analogRead(i) * 0.9)+ (sens_value[i] * 0.1)) ; // read the input pin and reduce noise
00047 
00048 }
00049 
00050 int OrientationAndHeading::delta_ADC(int index){ //subtract current value from offset
00051   return (sens_value[index] - sens_offset[index]);
00052 }

00063

00068
